## html.getImgAttrs() function

Returns `<img>` attributes generated from a `Yoot` object, merged with optional custom attributes.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function getImgAttrs(yoot: Yoot, options?: ImgAttrsOptions): ImgAttrs;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter

</th><th>

Type

</th><th>

Description

</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

yoot

</td><td>

[Yoot](./yoot.yoot.md)

</td><td>

A `Yoot` object.

</td></tr>
<tr><td>

options

</td><td>

[ImgAttrsOptions](./yoot.jsx.imgattrsoptions.md)

</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Optional `<img>` attributes and `srcSetBuilder`<!-- -->.

</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

ImgAttrs

HTML attributes for an `<img>` element.

## Example 1

```ts
import {yoot, getImgAttrs} from '@yoot/yoot';

const thumbnail = yoot({
  src: 'https://cdn.example.com/image.jpg',
  alt: 'Thumbnail',
})
  .width(96)
  .aspectRatio(1);

const attrs = getImgAttrs(thumbnail);
// Output (urls differ between adapters):
// { src: 'https://cdn.example.com/image.jpg&w=96&h=96',
//   width: 96, height: 96}
```

## Example 2

```ts
import {yoot, getImgAttrs} from '@yoot/yoot';

const thumbnail = yoot({
  src: 'https://cdn.example.com/image.jpg',
  alt: 'Thumbnail',
})
  .width(96)
  .aspectRatio(1);

const attrs = getImgAttrs(thumbnail, {loading: 'lazy', 'data-img': 'thumbnail'});
// Output (urls differ between adapters):
// { src: 'https://cdn.example.com/image.jpg&w=96&h=96',
//   width: 96, height: 96, loading: 'lazy', 'data-img': 'thumbnail'}
```
